price: 84. Dheh: “Yaa leh dhulka iyo waxa ku sugan, haddaad garaneysaan?!’’
arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul limani al-arḍu waman fīhā in kuntum taʿlamūna
